labels.label:
(6) IMPORTANT:
Remember to enable all the controller services

(5) IMPORTANT:
Go to "prometheus-collector" process group. Select "RequestPrometheusAPI" and set concurrent tasks vakue to the specified value for the "events" parameter in the context

(2) Parameter context NOTES:
Set "events" parameter to the number of events sent per second to the broker. This value is calculated from the number of concurrent tasks configured at the prometheus-collector's GenerateJSONData processor, multiplied by 10 (the number of timeseries samples generated by the processor).

(1) Parameter context NOTES:
Create new parameter context. Apply context to all executed process groups

(4) Parameter context NOTES:
Set "broker-port" to the context broker NGSI-LD API port and port, e.g. 9090 (for scorpio scenario)

(3) Parameter context NOTES:
Set "broker-name" to the container service name and port, e.g. scorpio (for scorpio scenario)
Create "collectionTimestamp" attribute with now timestamp
Split into individual time series samples
